name: Cachette
description:
You play Kaku a little child alone in her house. She heard a strange noise and want to build a hideout to wait for her parents. Be careful with the thing who made noises because after the count down it appears... 

Bonus instructions (oops) :

To see the list (or you can play hard core and don't look) : click with the middle button's mouse to make the list bigger and click again with the left button to make it little again. 

Secret access to have the ending (lol) :  after having built your hideout, click on the Rex cap in the kid's room. 

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

This is a project inspired by the graphic universe of Cédric Manche, illustrator of Belgium  and French comics. I choose to keep the black and white colors and the simple graphics. It was done with Game Maker (ver 1.4). 

I made all the game  expect the music. The game is for everyone so I made drawings for child audience.
